title: Hello
body:
Thank you for your interest in Infopro Learning.

As a part of the Adapt Developer hiring process, we invite you to take up the technical assignment documented in this deck. The objective of this exercise is to help us to understand your strengths and fitment to Experience Developer Team.


Here are some instructions to help you to complete the assignment.

1. Use Adapt authoring tool.

2. There are three pages to develop. One page for navigation and another two are topics. PSDs are available here.

3. This course will be force and linear

4. Use parallax scrolling in the headers. Here is the example

5. Make responsive development of these pages.

6. Feel free to add custom coding under any sections.

7. Samples of each component/interactions are provided in the PSDs, use same approach for all the relevant sections.

8. This will be an advantage if, dimension of the output will be 1366px.
